rows.label: qev040101_MSG0001
rows.name: Ah! Is tall friend a mighty BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0002
rows.name:
You must go save Lana! Save sweetheart of Bubu!
Bubu give friend anything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev040101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Bubu for the details.

rows.label: qev040101_JNK0020
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev040101_SEL0021
rows.name:
Say you don't know what the issue is,
but you're busy regardless.

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0003
rows.name: That cruel! Also not matter. Bubu MAKE friend help![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0004
rows.name: Bubu be rude as necessary to help Lana![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0005
rows.name:
Lana is wife of Bubu. Total angel. Perfectness.
Never has Mira seen more beautiful Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0006
rows.name:
*sniff* But angel of Bubu left for Cauldros to buy new
inventory and never return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0007
rows.name:
Bubu tried to stop Lana. Told Lana there was no
reason for gentle Nopon like her to go to such
dangerous place all alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0008
rows.name:
But Lana insist on helping business of Bubu.
So kind! So giving![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0009
rows.name:
How can one Nopon be so sweet? Surely friend is also
deeply enamored with Lana by now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev040101_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Bubu that Lana sounds wonderful.

rows.label: qev040101_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev040101_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Bubu that you don't especially care.

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Bubu understand. But friend will kindly remember that
angel Lana already has very special someone.
Friend should avoid getting any sneaky ideas.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Friend is confused by sudden surge of feeling.
Bubu understand. But friend must also remember
that angel Lana is taken. So no getting funny ideas![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0012
rows.name:
And with that, Bubu ask that friend travel to Cauldros
and check up on darling Lana.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0013
rows.name:
Friend will be paid well! No price too high for angel of
Bubu! But in return, Bubu expect friend to do anything
in powers to keep Lana safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0014
rows.name:
Thank you, friend! Bubu want Lana to forever be
smiling her amazing angel smile.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0015
rows.name:
Bubu would have sent Lana off with thousand BLADE
escorts if Bubu knew there would be trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0016
rows.name: Now go to Cauldros and bring angel of Bubu home![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0017
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_JNK0050
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev040101_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Bubu why he has suddenly stopped talking.

rows.label: qev040101_JNK0060
rows.name: Insist

rows.label: qev040101_SEL0061
rows.name: Demand that Bubu pay you.

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0018
rows.name: Sorry, friend. Bubu in middle of marital squabble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0019
rows.name:
Lana not being reasonable! Bubu was so worried,
but angel not sorry at all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0020
rows.name: Bubu not want to talk to her right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0021
rows.name: Ah, yes. Here is reward for friend. Many thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0022
rows.name: Ah, apologies. Bubu so mad, he forget about business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0023
rows.name:
...Huh? Friend want to know why Bubu filled with
murderous rage?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0024
rows.name:
Because Lana not being reasonable! Bubu so worried,
but special angel not sorry at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0025
rows.name: Bubu not want to talk to her right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0026
rows.name: But reward for friend is here. Take it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0027
rows.name:
Bubu in angel withdrawal after not seeing Lana for
so long. Body of Bubu shaking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0028
rows.name: What kept sweet Lana away so long?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_JNK0070
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev040101_SEL0071
rows.name: Tell Bubu the truth of what happened.

rows.label: qev040101_JNK0080
rows.name: Evade

rows.label: qev040101_SEL0081
rows.name: Say only that Lana won't be coming back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0029
rows.name:
Whaaaat?! Lana living happily in Cauldros?
She m-mamapon to littlepon of Walolo?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0030
rows.name:
Is this because Bubu not feed Lana lots of meat?
Bubu only worried for health of angel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0031
rows.name:
...Not coming home? But why?
What did Bubu do wrong?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0032
rows.name:
Is this because Bubu not feed Lana lots of meat?
Bubu only worried for health of angel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0033
rows.name: Bubu was happy to give Lana anything she wanted...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0034
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040101_MSG0035
rows.name:
Bubu needs alone thinking time now.
Here is payment.[ST:wait ]
